name: Meatball Dungeon (In Development)
description:
Meatball Dungeon is a game I am currently developing about rolling a meatball through culinary dungeons, trying to fulfill orders and stay delicious.

This is very very early in development, but you can try the most recent dev build for yourself if you like.

Things in the game:

  • Picking up ingredients.
  • Color and flavor changing based on ingredients.
  • Fire hazards.
  • Customer orders. (just one, actually)
  • Customer satisfaction rating up to five stars.
  • Really big room of garlic that's fun to smash.

Things not yet in the game:

  • Ingredient chopping/peeling/cooking.
  • Enemies.
  • Dangerous ingredients/hazards.
  • Any good art.
  • Everything else.
